name: guess-the-number
description: Number guessing game with frontend and backend

scripts.license-report: echo Frontend Dependencies: > license-report.md && echo ===================== >> license-report.md && npx license-checker --production --summary >> license-report.md && echo. >> license-report.md && echo Backend Dependencies: >> license-report.md && echo ==================== >> license-report.md && npx license-checker --dev --summary >> license-report.md
